name: grocy
description: Grocy is a self-hosted grocery and household management solution. It tracks inventory, shopping lists, chores, tasks, and meal planning through a clean and responsive web UI with barcode support.
features: Inventory Tracking: Monitor food and household items with quantity tracking and expiration dates.
Shopping Lists: Create and manage shopping lists with automatic suggestions based on inventory.
Meal Planning: Plan meals and automatically generate shopping lists from recipes.
Barcode Scanning: Add products quickly using barcode scanner via mobile app or webcam.
Recipe Management: Store recipes with ingredients and automatically track inventory usage.
Chore Tracking: Schedule and track household chores and maintenance tasks.
Battery Management: Monitor battery-powered devices and track battery replacements.
Waste Reduction: Reduce food waste by tracking expiration dates and consumption patterns.
